title: Heart of a Peacekeeper
description: Something is coming...Tough as nails Head Peacekeeper, Desdemona, keeps a tight grip on her settlement on the outskirts of the Outlaw Sector. With a rising body count, attacks, and escalating outlaw activity, the last thing she needs is a dangerously handsome Daamen trader interested in her.Simons had dealings with Des before none of them good. But his clashes start to turn more amorous, and before he knows it, hes falling for the bad-tempered, and equally bad-mouthed, peacekeeper.Events can only culminate in two things - one hotly intimate, the other so very deadly...
author: Angela Verdenius
